attributes.action: Solar park farms, motor way and countryside road verges have wild flower margins
attributes.background: Solar Park farms, motorway and out of town verges are bare, Planting green spaces with wild flowers margins would benefit pollinators and drivers, but also cut costs on Council budgets. Creating a scheme to plant our verges would also benefit drivers giving our country side more colour and purpose.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
